name: Petri Dish Simulator
description:
Welcome to Petri-Dish Simulator! This is a Petri dish simulator, where bacteria can thrive. They are born, eat, and die. Along the way, getting mutations. Because of mutations, creatures can change their characteristics, such as speed and color. Controls:
• W, A, S, D - movement
• Q and R - camera rotation
• Mouse wheel - zoom in/out.
